iSad.

To Steve and the apple family,

Thank you for being part of my family and now that your gone you will never be forgotten.  You left a wonderful team of people who will continue your vision for this great company you created.  My family will always continue to remember you through the wonderful products that Apple will continue to make.  Thank you again for the wonderful past and future memories your products will make.  As my family continues to grow we will use every single apple products to show case memories that are going to be created on your machines.  Thank you again Steve.
author: Humberto
